name: Threekit React Dev Kit Design System
description:
This design system contains all the styles, components, and guidelines you need to design a basic product configurator. This design system complements Threekit’s React Dev Kit, as well as functionality found in the Threekit Platform.


In case you haven’t noticed, this is a Figma community file! Figma is Threekit’s recommended UI design tool. It is cross-platform, free, collaborative, and gives your organization access to design resources like this one.


This document will be periodically updated with new and improved components and designs. If you have any questions or concerns, check out our documentation, or reach out to us on our community forums.


Duplicate this file to your Figma account to start using its resources. Happy designing!
